params.name: args
params.description: List of strings to parse. The default is taken from sys.argv. (same as argparse.ArgumentParser)

params.name: return_remaining_strings
params.description: If true, also return a list of remaining argument strings.

params.name: look_for_args_file
params.description: If true, will look for a .args file with the same base name as the entry point script for thisprocess, and will append its potential content to the command line args.

params.name: args_filename
params.description: If not None, will uses this file instead of the .args file specified in the previous argument.

params.name: args_file_flag
params.description: If not None, will look for a file in the command-line args specified with this flag. The flag can bespecified multiple times and precedence is determined by the order (last one wins).
